name: Infinite Bounty
description:
Infinite Bounty is a online 3rd person smash & grab shooter game for up to 4 colleagues on your own personal Infinite Bounty Investment ship.

Gear up with a selection of Infinite Bounty standard issue tools to help blow apart Lodes and harvest their sweet sweet nuggets!

Fire yourselves down to the dying planet [ IGNOVA ] to begin living your Infinite Bounty Associate Resource Liberation Consultant dreams!
